attributes.action: Keep the pound £ in the United Kingdown and not to be swallowd up by the European Parliment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To avoid becoming swallowed up by Europe we must ensure that the United Kingdom does not take on the Euro as its currance and remain as independant as possible

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
